long_description: The Mammut Neon Light 12 climbing pack is light and packs up small. Its short and slim body and gear loops make it ideal for climbing rock or ice. Stowable and removable hipbelt, anatomically shaped shoulder straps and a padded back panel offer comfort and a secure fit. Panel-loading main compartment and hydration compartment feature separate access zippers (hydration reservoir sold separately). Easily stash and organize your gear with large and small front zippered pockets, inner mesh pocket and daisy-chain gear loops. The Mammut Neon Light 12 climbing pack is made of 70-denier ripstop nylon with 420-denier nylon Oxford base fabric.
short_description: The Mammut Neon Light 12 climbing pack is light and packs up small. Its short and slim body and gear loops make it ideal for climbing rock or ice.
